countries.name: Al-Kuwait
countries.description: Kuwait is known for its petroleum reserves, which are among the world's largest, and its economy is heavily dependent on the oil industry.

countries.name: Tokio
countries.description: Tokyo is famous for its bustling city life, cutting-edge technology, and rich history and culture.

countries.name: Rome
countries.description: Located in the central-western portion of the Italian Peninsula, Rome is famous for its rich history, stunning architecture, and cultural significance.

countries.name: Paris
countries.description: Paris is famous for its iconic landmarks, world-class museums, art galleries, fashion, and gastronomy.

countries.name: Rotterdam
countries.description: It is the second-largest city in the Netherlands and one of the largest ports in the world. Rotterdam is known for its modern architecture, bustling port, and vibrant cultural scene.
